breakfast.title: Greek Yogurt Protein Bowl
breakfast.description: High-protein Greek yogurt topped with granola, berries, and nuts for a quick energizing start.
instructions: Scoop 1 cup Greek yogurt (24g protein) into bowl
Add 2 tbsp chopped almonds (4g protein)
Top with 1/2 cup mixed berries and 1/4 cup granola
Drizzle with honey if desired
Mix and enjoy immediately

lunch.title: Grilled Chicken Caesar Wrap
lunch.description: Seasoned grilled chicken breast wrapped with romaine lettuce and parmesan in a whole wheat tortilla.
instructions: Season and grill 5oz chicken breast for 6-7 minutes per side
Warm large whole wheat tortilla in microwave for 20 seconds
Spread 2 tbsp Caesar dressing on tortilla
Add sliced chicken, chopped romaine, and 2 tbsp parmesan cheese
Roll tightly and slice in half

dinner.title: Beef Stir-Fry with Broccoli
dinner.description: Tender beef strips stir-fried with fresh broccoli and served over brown rice.
instructions: Heat 1 tbsp oil in large pan over high heat
Add 5oz sliced beef sirloin, cook 3-4 minutes until browned
Add 2 cups broccoli florets, stir-fry 3 minutes
Add soy sauce, garlic powder, and ginger to taste
Serve over 1/2 cup cooked brown rice

breakfast.title: Scrambled Eggs with Cottage Cheese Toast
breakfast.description: Fluffy scrambled eggs paired with protein-rich cottage cheese on whole grain toast.
instructions: Scramble 2 whole eggs + 1 egg white in non-stick pan with butter
Toast 2 slices whole grain bread
Spread 1/2 cup cottage cheese on toast
Serve eggs alongside cottage cheese toast
Season eggs with salt, pepper, and chives

lunch.title: Tuna Salad Stuffed Avocados
lunch.description: Fresh tuna salad made with Greek yogurt served in halved avocados with mixed greens.
instructions: Mix 1 can tuna with 3 tbsp Greek yogurt and diced celery
Cut 1 large avocado in half and remove pit
Scoop tuna mixture into avocado halves
Serve on bed of mixed greens with cherry tomatoes
Season with lemon juice, salt, and pepper

dinner.title: Baked Salmon with Quinoa
dinner.description: Herb-seasoned baked salmon fillet served with fluffy quinoa and steamed asparagus.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F and season 6oz salmon fillet
Bake salmon for 12-15 minutes until flaky
Cook 1/2 cup quinoa according to package directions
Steam asparagus spears for 5 minutes
Serve salmon over quinoa with asparagus on the side

breakfast.title: Protein Pancakes
breakfast.description: Quick blender pancakes made with protein powder, oats, and banana for a filling breakfast.
instructions: Blend 1 scoop protein powder, 1/2 cup oats, 1 banana, 1 egg, and splash of milk
Heat non-stick pan over medium heat
Pour batter to make 3 pancakes, cook 2-3 minutes per side
Stack pancakes and top with berries
Serve with sugar-free syrup if desired

lunch.title: Black Bean and Chicken Quesadilla
lunch.description: Melted cheese and seasoned chicken with black beans grilled between whole wheat tortillas.
instructions: Mix 3oz cooked chicken with 1/3 cup black beans and seasonings
Place mixture and 1/4 cup cheese between 2 tortillas
Cook in pan 3-4 minutes per side until golden and cheese melts
Cut into wedges and serve with salsa
Add side of Greek yogurt for extra protein

dinner.title: Turkey Meatballs with Zucchini Noodles
dinner.description: Lean turkey meatballs in marinara sauce served over spiralized zucchini noodles.
instructions: Mix 5oz ground turkey with egg, breadcrumbs, and Italian seasonings
Form into 8 meatballs and bake at 375°F for 18 minutes
Spiralize 2 medium zucchini into noodles
Sauté zucchini noodles for 2-3 minutes
Serve meatballs over noodles with marinara sauce

breakfast.title: Breakfast Burrito Bowl
breakfast.description: Scrambled eggs with black beans, cheese, and avocado served over a bed of spinach.
instructions: Scramble 2 eggs with 1 tbsp milk in non-stick pan
Heat 1/3 cup black beans in microwave
Place handful of spinach in bowl
Top with scrambled eggs, beans, and 1/4 cup shredded cheese
Add diced avocado and salsa to taste

lunch.title: Chicken and Hummus Power Bowl
lunch.description: Grilled chicken breast served with hummus, quinoa, and fresh vegetables in a nourishing bowl.
instructions: Grill 5oz chicken breast seasoned with herbs for 12-14 minutes
Cook 1/3 cup quinoa according to package directions
Arrange quinoa in bowl with 3 tbsp hummus
Slice chicken and add to bowl with cucumber and tomatoes
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice

dinner.title: Pork Tenderloin with Sweet Potato
dinner.description: Seasoned pork tenderloin with roasted sweet potato wedges and green beans.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F and season 5oz pork tenderloin
Cut sweet potato into wedges and toss with oil
Roast pork and sweet potatoes for 20 minutes
Steam green beans for last 5 minutes of cooking
Let pork rest 3 minutes before slicing

breakfast.title: Smoked Salmon Bagel
breakfast.description: Everything bagel topped with cream cheese, smoked salmon, capers, and red onion.
instructions: Toast 1 everything bagel until golden brown
Spread 2 tbsp cream cheese on both halves
Layer 3oz smoked salmon on bottom half
Top with thin red onion slices and capers
Close sandwich and serve immediately

lunch.title: Lentil and Turkey Soup
lunch.description: Hearty soup with ground turkey, red lentils, and vegetables in a savory broth.
instructions: Brown 4oz ground turkey in large pot with diced onion
Add 1/2 cup red lentils, 2 cups broth, and diced carrots
Simmer 15 minutes until lentils are tender
Season with herbs, salt, and pepper
Serve hot with crusty bread if desired

dinner.title: Shrimp Scampi with Whole Wheat Pasta
dinner.description: Garlic butter shrimp served over whole wheat linguine with parmesan cheese and parsley.
instructions: Cook 2oz whole wheat pasta according to package directions
Sauté 6oz shrimp with garlic and butter for 3-4 minutes
Add white wine and lemon juice to pan
Toss cooked pasta with shrimp and sauce
Garnish with parmesan cheese and fresh parsley

items.title: I Made These Honey Sriracha Cauliflower Wings in the Air Fryer and We Devoured Them
This One-Pot Taco Macaroni Is the Easy, High-Protein Dinner Everyone Loves
This Cozy Tuscan White Bean Soup with Meatballs Is High in Protein, Fiber, and Pure Comfort
